item.title: Bin bags all up the road, 23rd April
item.description:
I thought these were council litter picker bags but they've been there for a few days now. About 5 bags dumped up this road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Cirencester Road, Charlton Kings

item.title: 3 deep potholes, 24th April
item.description:
2 deep potholes in middle of traffic lights area westbound side at six ways, Charlton kings, A40, plus dropped gully just beyond them - at kings balti restaurant - one pothole eastbound just before ingress to ryeworth road, A40.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 237b London Road, Charlton Kings

item.title: Deep pothole 36" x 20", 22nd April
item.description:
This pothole is one of a number of very dangerous potholes that have been unrepaired for at least 8 weeks on a major cycling route. Accidents are waiting to happen!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Elkstone
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large series of Dangerous Potholes on the side going INTO Cheltenham just after the Magistrates Court, St. George's Road, 22nd April
item.description:
The biggest pothole is dangerous and has caused actual alloy Wheel Damage (loud crash and Bang) - buckling, resulting in an estimate of nearly Â£900 to repair the passenger side wheels. 19/04/21, Approx 11:00. Many vehicles went over this, poorly marked and unavoidable if parked cars and oncoming vehicles prevent swerving.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 59 Saint Georges Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish, broken pavement, shopping trolleys, 22nd April
item.description:
The whole street is full of shopping trolleys, mattresses, curbs broken and leftover cardboard and furniture pieces throughout the street.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Play Area Shamrock Close, Churchdown
